issues.description: The symbol declaration for fix_vec_sub_asm differs between the template and the solution. In template_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm (lines 10–11) fix_vec_sub_asm is declared global, whereas in solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm (lines 10–11) it is declared extern. This mismatch can prevent the function from being properly exported and linked, causing linker errors or student confusion.
issues.suggested_fix: In solution_repository/assignment/fix_vec_sub.asm, replace the 'extern fix_vec_sub_asm' directive with 'global fix_vec_sub_asm' so that the symbol export matches the template and links correctly.
